articles.author: By LARRY NEUMEISTER Associated Press
articles.title: Feds: Atlantic City boardwalk attack central to sex charges
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Federal prosecutors say a woman kidnapped from the Atlantic City boardwalk and a 14-year-old girl were victims of a man arrested on sex trafficking charges Tuesday.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Federal prosecutors say a woman kidnapped from the Atlantic City boardwalk and a 14-year-old girl were victims of a man arrested on sex trafficking charges Tuesday.
David Williams, 35, was held without bail after a brief appearance in Manhattan… [+1915 chars]

articles.title: Insanity defense being sought in slaying, mutilation case
articles.description: BENNINGTON TOWNSHIP, Mich. (AP) — A public defender filed a notice to seek an insanity defense for a mid-Michigan man accused in the slaying and mutilation of a man he met online.
articles.content:
BENNINGTON TOWNSHIP, Mich. (AP) A public defender filed a notice to seek an insanity defense for a mid-Michigan man accused in the slaying and mutilation of a man he met online.
Shiawassee County Court documents say attorney Douglas Corwin also filed a motio… [+1707 chars]

articles.title: Nevada bus riders will be able to purchase tickets with Uber
articles.description: LAS VEGAS (AP) — An agreement between Uber and regional transportation officials will allow riders in Nevada to purchase bus tickets through the ride-hailing service.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS (AP) An agreement between Uber and regional transportation officials will allow riders in Nevada to purchase bus tickets through the ride-hailing service.
The Regional Transportation Commission of Southern Nevada announced the partnership with Uber… [+831 chars]

articles.title: Stepfather of hip-hop duo Rae Sremmurd shot, killed
articles.description: TUPELO, Miss. (AP) — The stepfather of hip-hop duo Rae Sremmurd has been killed in Mississippi and their brother is being held in his death, a spokesman for the group confirmed Tuesday.
articles.content:
TUPELO, Miss. (AP) The stepfather of hip-hop duo Rae Sremmurd has been killed in Mississippi and their brother is being held in his death, a spokesman for the group confirmed Tuesday.
